env_file_updates.overview:
The project online Dev Env mode can update .env and .env.sample files with correct Jira/Confluence configuration.
See ../../sdlc/shared/env-setup-workflow.md for: - Canonical Jira/Confluence URLs and formats - .env.sample template content - Safe update workflows
env_file_updates.mode_behavior: Update .env files safely using patterns from shared file. NEVER overwrite existing API tokens. Only update URLs and format.
